Liightmare got angry.

"I'm not standing here just to be bored! I'm not protecting your butt all of
the time just because your old bodyguard left! Sheesh!" Lightmare said.
Lightmare walked off and started to walk around the base, seeing as she had
no friends and nobody to talk to. Lightmare walked back inside.

"Listen, Quickstrike, I'm sorry, I was a bit mean, say, maybe I should hang
out with you, get to know you better, maybe we could be friends?" Lightmare
said to Quickstrike...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 21, 2000 11:50 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> Quickstrike:
>
>
>
>
> Quickstrike looked at Lightmare. "Stay here fer now." He opened his
> comm-link. "Mantella, Shredder, Sinesis, Sinester, Stringtra, listen fer
> commands. Stand-by." After that he ran out from the ramp of the base,
> running a few strides. He transformed to beast mode and skurried as fast
as
> his many legs would carry him. He went to the direction of Dark Mouse and
> Scorponok's location. There was no time laying down now.
